meanings.definition: Containing the largest or thickest pieces
meanings.sent1: The stew had the chunkiest vegetables I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: She picked the chunkiest crayon from the box to color with.
meanings.sent3: The chunkiest puzzle piece was always the hardest to find.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the chunkiest part of the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The chunkiest clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.

meanings.definition: Having the most prominent or noticeable chunks
meanings.sent1: The chocolate chip cookies were the chunkiest I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The soup was so chunky, it was the chunkiest I had ever eaten.
meanings.sent3: His backpack was the chunkiest in the class, bulging with snacks.
meanings.sent4: The chunkiest necklace she wore sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The chunkiest part of the story was the unexpected twist at the end.
